scenario_name: Return to For the Greater Good
full_name: Scenario V: Return to For the Greater Good

steps.text: Choose one of the two Lounge locations at random. Put the Lodge Catacombs and the chosen Lounge into play. Remove the other version of the Lounge from the game.

bullets.text: Each investigator begins play at the Lodge Gates.
Set each other remaining location aside, out of play (Library, Vault, Inner Sanctum, and the 2 Sanctum Doorway locations).

steps.text: For the duratio of the scenario, the following additional rules apply: "The Objective on Act 3a is optional. After all other ([skull]/[cultist]/[tablet]/[elder_thing]) keys have been put into play, if another effect would cause a set-aside key to be put into play, use another unused (+/-) chaos token instead of putting no key into play. At the end of the scenario, add each (+/-) chaos token controlled by an investigator to the victory display. Each one is worth Victory 1." Attach the Return to For the Greater Good card to the scenario reference card as a reminder.
As part of the tarot campaign reading you performed, place "The Hierophant · V" in the reversed position.
As part of the tarot campaign reading you performed, place "The Hierophant · V" in the upright position.
